## Fertility

*Infant mortality vs Fertility*

```{r}
gap2011 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x= fertility, y=infant_mortality, size= population, color= continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
```

*Infant mortality vs Fertility boxplot*

```{r}
gap2011 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x= fertility, y=infant_mortality, size= population, color= continent)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
